page.title: 01MERCASTON & BRAILSFORD
page.content: ssssssRural area with dairy & arable farming sand & gravel quarry some home indust- ry fish hatchery,boarding kennels.Site of Special Scientific Interest.Only new building allowed is for agricult- ural purposes.Schooling in neighbour- ing villages & town & boarding schools.People work in farming quarry ing,home industry & in nearby towns. Shopping is done in supermarkets in Ashbourne & Derby.Most homes have deep freezers,cook by electricity & have piped water supply. Springs & wells are in use by the remainder.Daily del- ivery of mail & 2 collecting boxes. Mobile library calls fortnightly. Methodist Chapel.Site for Flamsteed Observatory.Shopping bus service to Derby on Fridays.Gypsies in area for over 200 years.
